record.description: Despite political differences between their respective nations, residents of International house on the University of Chicago campus form strong and lasting friendships and live amicably. Discussing international affairs gathered around a globe atlas, first row, left to right: D. Gorospe, Philippine islands; Mathilde Boertlein, Germany; Vera Stoyanova, Bulgaria; George Huszer, Hungary; and Djao Chwang, China; second row: Majid Khadduri, Iraq; Arthur Krause, Germany; John Whiteside, Scotland; Alma Satorius, America; Richard Elmhirst, Great Britain; Dr. Franz Martin Joseph, Germany; and A. Ertusrul Yener, Turkey.
